segments.text: I'm just trying to complete today's crossword puzzle . Whenever I get the time , I like to do the crossword puzzles in the paper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you really like brains that make you think , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess you could say that . What kind of games do you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess the games I like the most are the ones that I'm good at !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: doesn't everyone ? Which games are those ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , I like to play darts . Whenever I go to a bar , I usually play for a few hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: did you play a lot of games when you were little ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: my parents used to love to play checkers and dominoes . We used to have family tournaments every weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: do you still like playing those games ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: not at all . I never really did , to be honest . What about you ? Did your family used to play games together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: everyone in my family really enjoys playing card games .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: some of my friends play cards on the internet . Have you ever tried that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , I prefer to play with people I know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's a popular game with some people , but I've never played it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought everyone in your country were experts at mah-jong !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hate to disappoint you , but unlike what most people think , we aren't all exactly the same !
segments.speaker: S2
